title: Charlize Theron out in LA for 'Tully' premiere
text:
Charlize Theron out in LA for 'Tully' premiere 10:17am BST - 01:36 
The actress and mother of two opted to gain weight rather than don the fat suit to empathize with pregnant mothers. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
